content:
Hello! 

I am planning on opening a PR on a lemma about metrizability of a compact space, but can’t figure out which file to add this lemma to. The statement is that if X is a compact topological space and there exists a sequence of continuous functions that separates points on X, then X is metrizable.

My file currently imports Analysis.NormedSpace.FunctionSeries and Analysis.SpecificLimits.Basic, but after looking through the files having the same imports, I am not sure which of the files is the most appropriate for this lemma.  Does anyone have an idea where to add this lemma?
Janette Setälä has marked this topic as resolved.
I don't know if you know this already, but if you don't, we already have this: docs#TopologicalSpace.metrizableSpace_of_t3_second_countable which should be useful
